top.title: Ayatollah Khamenei's iron grip on power in Iran comes to an end
top.summary: Iranian state TV confirms the supreme leader has been killed on the first day of massive US and Israeli air strikes on the country.

top.title: What we know so far: Supreme Leader Khamenei killed, as Iran launches retaliatory strikes
top.summary: Iran responds by launching missiles and drones towards Israel and four Gulf Arab countries that host US military bases.

top.title: Iran says US and Israel strikes hit school killing 108
top.summary: There is no confirmation by the US or Israel of the strike on the school located near elite military troops.

top.title: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use
top.summary: The move announced on social media comes after a standoff between Anthropic's boss and the US Department of Defense.

top.title: Resident Evil Requiem's director on redefining the survival horror genre
top.summary: Director Koshi Nakanishi says balancing action and horror within the game has been a huge challenge.

top.title: 'I was on Instagram all day' - woman tells landmark trial
top.summary: The young woman, who accuses Meta and Google of making addictive social media platforms, has been speaking in court.

title.#text: Polymarket defends its decision to allow betting on war as ‘invaluable’
The Rubin Observatory’s alert system sent 800,000 pings on its first night
You can still grab great deals on Bose headphones and Astro Bot this weekend
